text_logic_form: The line $AB$ is parallel to the line $DC$.
The measure of angle $B$ is $60$ degrees.
The measure of angle $D$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $BC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $24$ units.
Find the perimeter of the quadrilateral $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $AB$ is parallel to the line $DC$.
The measure of angle $B$ is $60$ degrees.
The measure of angle $D$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $BC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $24$ units.
Find the perimeter of the quadrilateral $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $CBA$ is $60$ degrees.
The measure of angle $ADC$ is $45$ degrees.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BC$, $CD$, and $DA$, forming the quadrilateral $ABCD$.
